basics.name: Doris Alisa Ward
basics.label: Developer
basics.summary:
Developer with 7 years experience writing React Native apps for ios and android and React apps for web.
Industry experience in the software development lifecycle (SDLC) in development, decision-making, leading, testing, deploying, bug fixing, and designing user experiences.
Professional writer of React Native, React, Typescript, JavaScript, Redux, Realm, HTML5, CSS, PHP; using tools such as Jira, Git, Bitbucket, Trello; and following methodologies such as Agile and SCRUM.
Experience mentoring less-experienced devs, leading on smaller projects, maintaining legacy systems, decision making of code trajectory, reviewing code to ensure high quality, estimating effort/time required for tasks, supporting non-developer team members such as Product Owners, Scrum Masters, UX/UI Designers.
Excellent analytical and logical programming skills with a good understanding at the conceptual level.

work.name: Mayden
work.summary: React.JS and PHP development of new features and information security fixes. Maintenance of legacy systems and implementation of new features. Mentoring devs. Leading on sub-projects. Decision making on trajectory of the frontend codebases.

work.name: Living With
work.summary: Fixed bugs and added new features to react-native TS apps. Maintained a high quality code base by following coding standards and kept in mind the flexibility required for improvements in the future. Reviewed and tested code and added unit tests to reduce the likelihood of future bugs.

work.name: Living Map
work.summary: Developed front-end and UI across multiple map products across mobile and desktop platforms. Lead feature development of the Map Management System being delivered by multiple engineers. Development of applications using TypeScript, JavaScript, CSS, React.
